name: Super Shadow Dudes
description:
Stuck in Darkness you must platform through the the Grey world to find the light! But beware the other shadow dudes in your way they are not friendly! 

* 20 maps

* Platform Puzzles

* 3 enemy Types

* And Shadow Dudes !

This game is tribute to the old platform puzzle games of the past.

I made this game over the span of a couple days on my free time and was made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 144 (Jam Theme- In the Dark)

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-144
